act1: In this activity, we are going to learn about the subject verb agreement.
instr2: Read the passage and accordingly arrange the given jumbled sentences. To rearrange, drag and drop sentences.
instr3: For each sentence, check if it is true and uncheck if it is false.
instr4: Complete the given sentences by choosing an appropriate option.
instr5: Please select atleast one option for each question.
q_instr2: The quiz will start after clicking on the "OK" button, along with a timer.
q_instr3: To select an option as an answer to a given question, click on it.
q_instr4: You will get two attempts to select the correct option to the question.
q_instr5: You may skip the question if you want.
q_instr6: The score and timing are displayed on the top of the screen throughout the quiz.
q_instr7: You will get +1 for each correct answer. There is no negative marking.
q_instr8: The scorecard will be generated at the end of the quiz.
proc2: Arrange the given jumbled sentences in order as per the passage.
proc3: To check the your answer, click on ‘Submit’ button. The green sentence are the correct position and the red are the wrong position.
proc4: For each sentence, check if the sentence is True. Click on submit to check your answer, which is displayed at the right of the question.
proc5: Complete the sentences choosing an appropriate option. To check your answer click on ‘Submit’.
proc6: Complete the crossword with the help of given clues.
proc7: To reveal the answer of particular row/column click on it and click on respective row/column Reveal’ button e.g. ‘Reveal 3D’.
proc8: To check your particular answer click on the respective row/column ‘Check’ button e.g. ‘Check 3D’.
proc9: To check all your answer click on ‘Check All’ button.
wawgtl: What are we going to learn?
aysywtq: Are you sure you want to quit?
